title: Public Records Request – Sabrina Coyne Arrest Footage (January 24, 2025 – Bonita Springs)

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Public Records Request – Sabrina Coyne Arrest Footage (January 24, 2025 – Bonita Springs)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to the following public records:

Body-worn camera footage from any deputy involved in the response and arrest of Sabrina Coyne on the evening of January 24, 2025, at or near the residence of Charles Kilo in Bonita Springs, FL, beginning at approximately 10:30 PM and concluding with the end of on-scene activity or transport.

Rear seat in-car camera footage, if Ms. Coyne was placed in a patrol vehicle following her arrest or detainment.

This request is specifically related to the incident where Ms. Coyne allegedly threw a brick through her ex-husband’s window and was uncooperative during questioning. The timeframe requested is limited to reduce burden and focuses only on video directly tied to this incident.

If necessary, I consent to redactions in accordance with Florida law and request the release of all non-exempt portions.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Public Records Request – Bodycam & In-Car Footage of Andre Narcisse Arrest (March 19, 2024)

communications.subject: Colorado Open Records Act Request: Public Records Request – Bodycam & In-Car Footage of Andre Narcisse Arrest (March 19, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request the following records from the Edgewater Police Department:

All body-worn camera footage from the officer(s) involved in the traffic stop and arrest of Andre Narcisse, age 45, which occurred on the evening of Tuesday, March 19, 2024, beginning with the stop for traffic violations (motorcycle with flashing blue lights and stop sign violation) and concluding with the arrest.

Rear seat in-car camera footage, if Mr. Narcisse was placed in a patrol vehicle and transported following the arrest.

This request is limited to footage recorded during the full encounter—from the moment of initial contact through to Mr. Narcisse’s transport or on-scene conclusion. I understand portions of the bodycam video have been made publicly available and this request seeks the full, unedited version.

If any redactions are necessary to comply with Florida Statutes, I consent to such redactions and request the release of all non-exempt portions.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Public Information Act Request – Audrey Marie Schneider Arrest Video Footage (Nov. 14, 2024)

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Public Information Act Request – Audrey Marie Schneider Arrest Video Footage (Nov. 14, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the following video records related to the arrest of Audrey Marie Schneider, age 37, that occurred on November 14, 2024, following a pursuit that began in New Braunfels and concluded at the Alamo Quarry Market parking lot in San Antonio, TX:

All body-worn camera footage from Texas Department of Public Safety (DPS) troopers involved in the pursuit and arrest of Ms. Schneider, from first contact through transport or on-scene conclusion.

Dash camera footage from all patrol units involved in the pursuit, particularly the segments capturing:

The highway portion from New Braunfels into San Antonio.

The multiple laps through the Alamo Quarry Market parking lot.

The moment of vehicle stop and foot pursuit into the hair salon.

Rear seat in-car camera footage, if Ms. Schneider was transported in any DPS vehicle.

This request is limited to video captured between approximately 2:00 PM and 5:00 PM CST on November 14, 2024, and only involving personnel engaged in the Schneider incident. If footage from local agencies (e.g., San Antonio Police) was integrated into DPS case files, please include that as well.

I understand that video may be redacted to protect exempt information such as personal identifiers or sensitive law enforcement methods. I request that any non-exempt portions be released.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Public Records Request – Arrests and Jail Footage for Marlena Velez (Oct 30 & Nov 20, 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I request the following public records related to the arrests of Marlena Velez (DOB: [insert if known], Age 22), regarding two alleged incidents of theft from Target stores in Cape Coral, Florida:

All body-worn camera footage from Cape Coral Police Department officers related to both arrests of Marlena Velez:

First incident/arrest: related to the theft that occurred on October 30, 2024, with arrest and booking occurring shortly thereafter.

Second incident/arrest: related to the theft that occurred on November 20, 2024, with arrest on Saturday, December 2, 2024.

Rear seat camera footage from any Cape Coral PD patrol vehicle used to transport Ms. Velez during either arrest.

In-custody jail security footage capturing Ms. Velez’s statement, reportedly recorded during her first booking, in which she allegedly said “Lesson learned,” as referenced publicly by the department and in media coverage.

This request is limited to video/audio records captured between:

October 30, 2024 – December 3, 2024, for both incidents

Only those files directly associated with the arrest, processing, or transport of Marlena Velez

I understand some records may be subject to redaction, and I consent to the redaction of personal identifiers or unrelated third-party information.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: OPRA Request – Full Bodycam & In-Car Footage: Liam Mahoney Arrest, Belmar Beach (August 20, 2024)

communications.subject: New Jersey Open Public Records Act Request: OPRA Request – Full Bodycam & In-Car Footage: Liam Mahoney Arrest, Belmar Beach (August 20, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Jersey Open Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request the following records:

All body-worn camera footage from any Belmar Police Department officer involved in the encounter and arrest of Liam Mahoney on August 20, 2024, on the beach in Belmar, New Jersey. This request includes video from initial contact through the time Mr. Mahoney was placed into handcuffs at approximately 3:24 PM, and continuing through the conclusion of the incident, including any transport or field processing.

Any rear seat in-car video footage if Mr. Mahoney was placed in a patrol vehicle following his arrest.

This request is limited to footage directly related to Mr. Mahoney's arrest for obstruction, resisting arrest, and disorderly conduct. I understand bodycam footage has been publicly released in part; I request the complete, unedited footage for the full duration of officer interaction with Mr. Mahoney.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
